title: Doctor De Soto
creator_credit: Weston Woods Studios, Morton Schindel and Michael Sporn
brief_description: Doctor De Soto, a mouse dentist, refuses to treat animals “dangerous” to mice, until one day a fox shows up writhing in pain from a toothache. How Doctor De Soto and his assistant, Mrs. De Soto “outfox the fox” is a humorous story.
creator_credit_for_label: Weston Woods Studios, Morton Schindel and Michael Sporn
